title: QRCode on Arduino
author: Eugenio Pace
excerpt: For the e-Paper project I worked before I had to generate a QR code. The QR code encodes the login URL. The idea is that you point a phone's camera to it. Modern phones are configured to scan QRCodes automagically with their cameras and prompt the user to open a URL (the login URL in my case). Pretty convenient.

title: A Broadcaster for SMS MFA Challenges
author: Eugenio Pace
excerpt: Many web applications now require MFA which is great to see. Some use time based tokens (TOTP), with application like Google Authenticator to enroll and generate them. Others use SMS messages which are not super secure but better than nothing I guess... Others use a combination: TOTP with SMS as fallback. Very few apps have the sophistication to allow multiple phones to be enrolled on a given account.
